flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: This project I did took a good eye and some hardware experience. It costed me about $80.00 and totaled in 15-20 hours of work in a 2 week period.
guide.introduction_rendered: This project I did took a good eye and some hardware experience. It costed me about $80.00 and totaled in 15-20 hours of work in a 2 week period.
guide.summary: Make your own Mau5 Head with ease.  A rough walk-through to making your next halloween costume.
guide.title: Mau5 Head - Deadmau5
